Understanding the Modern Military
Conclusion

Course Completion and SCECHs

Is your course complete?

In order for your course to be recorded as completed in the PLP you must ensure that you have completed all of the activities in the Course Outline. To check this click on "Course Links" at the top left-hand side of your screen and choose "Grades" from the drop-down menu. If you find that you have not earned a passing grade on something listed here you must go back and re-do that item until you do meet the requirements in order to receive completion status for this course. If all your grades are marked as completed, the system will report your completion and your certificate will be created. You should receive an email within 3 hours, with directions for how to download your certificate.

If there are any content pieces from this course you would like to save for later, please make sure to download them now, since you will lose access to the course 30 days after completion.

SCECH Check

This course offers State Continuing Education Clock Hours (SCECHs). To earn your SCECHs, please make sure you've completed all activities and have spent the equivalent of the SCECH minimum learning your way through the course. You can check your "Grades" to be sure that all the activities have been completed. Your SCECHs will be uploaded to MOECS within 10 days of the end of your course. At that time you will be notified via the email address on your MOECS account with further directions on how to claim your SCECH credits in the MOECS system. Visit the Professional Learning Portal SCECH Courses page for further information.
